text:
@WhiteHouse @PressSec The more than 40,000 National Guard members deployed to states to help in coronavirus relief may end up one day short of qualifying for federal benefits under the Post-9/11 GI bill once President Trump's executive order deploying them expires on June 24.
https://t.co/OGBcccvVKC
